description:
After another beating from Garp, Luffy and his friends take to the jungle and build a pirate hideout at the top of an enormous tree. First order of business: booby trap the new place!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dadan Ikka to no Wakare!? Kansei! Himitsu Kichi
Dire adieu à la famille Dadan ? La construction de la base secrète
Leaving the Dadan Family for Good?! The Kids` Hideout Has Been Built!
Расставание с семьёй Дадан?! Секретная база построена!
ダダン一家との別れ!? 完成! 秘密基地
